title: The academie of eloquence containing a compleat English rhetorique, exemplified with common-places and formes digested into an easie and methodical way to speak and write fluently according to the mode of the present times : together with letters both amorous and moral upon emergent occasions / by Tho. Blount, Gent.
author: Blount, Thomas, 1618-1679.
publisher: Printed by T.N. for Humphrey Moseley ...,
